sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import {Playground} from 'docz'
import styled from '@emotion/styled'
import Wrapper from 'bractal'
import {Button} from 'bractal/core-ui'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = (function() {
  const Container = styled.div({
    '.react-live-preview > div > div > *': {margin: 5},
  })
  return props => (
    <Container>
      {/* <Wrapper> */}
      {props.children}
      {/* </Wrapper> */}
    </Container>
  )
})()
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             Layout={this.layout} layoutProps={Object.assign({}, layoutProps, props)}
             components={components}>


<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-example"}}>{`Basic Example`}</MDXTag>

    <Button xl>Click This</Button>
    <Button lg>Click This</Button>

    <Button sm>Click This</Button>
    <Button xs>Click This</Button>
  </Wrapper>

<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"types"}}>{`Types`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Two types are supported, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Primary`}</MDXTag>{` `}{`&`}{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Secondary`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>

</MDXTag>
